report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM Vulnerabilities
chapter_title: Severity

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM Vulnerabilities
text: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could allow a user with physical access to create an API request modified to create additional objects.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM Vulnerabilities
text: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 and 21.0.2 is vulnerable to External Service Interaction attack, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to induce the application to perform server-side DNS lookups or HTTP requests to arbitrary domain names. By submitting suitable payloads, an attacker can cause the application server to attack other systems that it can interact with.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM Vulnerabilities
text: A vulnerability exists where an IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 regular user is able to obtain view-only access to some admin pages in the Control Center

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM Vulnerabilities
text: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.7 and lower stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM Vulnerabilities
chapter_title: Impact
text: Data Manipulation Security Bypass Information Disclosure

chapter_title: Remediation
